feed.title: Gil Emmanuel Bancud Blog
feed.subtitle: A personal blog to disseminate distilled knowledge and wisdom

entry.title: Surviving Undergraduate College
entry.summary: Disclaimer This blogpost is a consolidation of my thoughts in after roughly 8 years of experience in college. This reflects on the decisions I’ve made and the consequential responsibilities born from them. My views are undoubtedly contextualized with personal opinion, and should never be considered as an absolute truth; nevertheless, my unsolicited advice should hopefully give you a certain pe...

entry.title: Facemask Object Detection
entry.summary: Introduction Approaching any machine learning task from start to finish generally requires experience in different aspects in the machine learning lifecycle. This lifecycle includes: data collection, data transformation, model creation, model training, deployment, and feedback. This blogpost explores some of these parts in broad strokes to paint a general overview and create shallow experi...

entry.title: Writing a New Post
entry.summary: Naming and Path Create a new file named YYYY-MM-DD-TITLE.EXTENSION and put it in the _posts/ of the root directory. Please note that the EXTENSION must be one of md and markdown. Front Matter Basically, you need to fill the Front Matter as below at the top of the post: --- title: TITLE date: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS +/-TTTT categories: [TOP_CATEGORIE, SUB_CATEGORIE] tags: [TAG] # TAG names s...
